text: John Foster (born September 13, 1936) is an American former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the United States Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Muskegon, Michigan
title: John Foster (sport shooter)
